title: Week 1
text:
Template Overview
Template Purpose
The goal of this document is to provide a helpful, easily editable template for UBC students, staff, and faculty. Several presentation slide classes are available.
This is an example of a .paragraph-content class slide. Code can be visually represented using backticks: ``.
How to Edit
This template is a Quarto presentation. It should be edited through RStudio.
I would strongly recommend using editor: source rather than editor: visual. Managing classes becomes very clunky in RStudioâ€™s visual editor.
